column3: “This strain is the whip, well known through out Central Michigan reaching into the Detroit area! Hard, & compact yet florally strong, piney, dank smell! we just love it! sedates for hours, definitely a day wrecker if you over indulge!! Hats off to the breeder! Hear he's doing Fed time for growing this gorgeous female!”
“Wow! Goooooood medicine,  great for insomnia & pain”
“This strain is perfect for those looking to treat anxiety. A great body relaxation accompanies the calm, near-sedate head high.”
“I became intimately familiar with Brand X back in 1984, and I loved it, as it was infinitely better than anything else available at the time.... I'm glad to see it available once again.”
“killer strain, great for pain & insomnia”
“This is a well rounded strain, it is potent, stinky, hard & pretty!  Like your girlfriend after... I can't write that! Ha! Pure Michigan genetics”
“Always love to find a family heirloom strain that kicks my insomnia away! Michigan strain found at the Michigan 12 mmmc”

“Stinky, this stuff smells of citrus, lemons that are rather hard nuggets that are dark green with bright orange pistils. Great effects, a little intense for minute, but planes off & ride that wave! In my case, right to the couch!”
“killer strain, great for pain & insomnia”

“When you cannot sleep because of sleep disorders & insomnia, it isn't fun & can lead to health issues. I've tried every prescription drug in the pharmacy without any relief. My friend tried to convince me in giving medical cannabis a try. I was hesitant because of the stigma associated with it. So glad I gave in. Tried many that promised sleep but, not that effective until I used Brand X. Wow, after using it I have b...”
“Pretty dank strain & learned this is from Michigan. That is nice to see at the club. I'm going to support this one for all her glory!  😎”
“GOOD MEDICINE”

“This Cannabis is very intense. Just a warning, the effects come instantly, starting in the mind which I thought might be too much for me, but eventually it tapered off to the rest of my body. I was relaxed for hours & I slept well too. It impressed me because I often have a difficult time falling & staying a sleep.
Plus, it's nice to try something different, besides all the same old strains that are at most of the di...”

“Brand X  The name didn't move me. I actually went for some Anonymous and since the Bud Tender recommended the Brand X I grabbed a quarter. I went home fired up some Anonymous and it was very mellow. But the Brand X, Oh my God ! I'm a veteran, been smoking since 1974 and the $hit made me woozy 😳 Tell you what, the only weed I had this good was Gandalf, and I had never heard of it before either. Long story short, I we...”
“bye bye pm medicine. brand x is my new sleep, sweet dream aid. turns my serta into a cloud.”
“These flowers are strong as hell. ⚠️Couch locked for hours & crashed on the couch while she hugged me away from my worries! 😊”

“Brand X  The name didn't move me. I actually went for some Anonymous and since the Bud Tender recommended the Brand X I grabbed a quarter. I went home fired up some Anonymous and it was very mellow. But the Brand X, Oh my God ! I'm a veteran, been smoking since 1974 and the $hit made me woozy 😳 Tell you what, the only weed I had this good was Gandalf, and I had never heard of it before either. Long story short, I we...”

“A ultimate Michigan Indica strain that is difficult to find. Earthy, pine & mint flavor that looks beautiful & hard nuggets. Was good at taking my pain away, calmed me down, gave me the munchies & then put me to dream land. 😂 I love strong Indicas & this one delivers. I found it at Cedar Leaf in Lansing.”

“This put my dick in the dirt. This is a night time strain!! Found out the hard way!! Lol. Got a really good nights sleep without taking any of my prescription sleep aids!! I guess I should have listened to the bud tender, it's a pure indica, go figure! Very recommended if you suffer from sleep disorders or pain”
“bye bye pm medicine. brand x is my new sleep, sweet dream aid. turns my serta into a cloud.”

“This Cannabis is very intense. Just a warning, the effects come instantly, starting in the mind which I thought might be too much for me, but eventually it tapered off to the rest of my body. I was relaxed for hours & I slept well too. It impressed me because I often have a difficult time falling & staying a sleep.
Plus, it's nice to try something different, besides all the same old strains that are at most of the di...”

“When I opened the jar it smelled of fermented lemonade & earthy. The nugs were dense, dark green & very crystal coated. The smoke is smooth, but expands a bit hitting you pretty fast. The buzz starts in the head & moves to relax you completely, eventually caused me to get tired & I slept well. Great for napping.”
“Good old brand x what a sleeping mans dream. Caution! Only one hit & wait a bit! Stoned out! Real heavy effects”
“Brand X is an amazing strain with a nice smell of pine with a hint of lemon. This strain is perfect if you just wanna chill and chow down. The perfect netflix and chill strain.”
“Brand X is an amazing strain with a nice smell of pine with a hint of lemon. This strain is perfect if you just wanna chill and chow down. The perfect netflix and chill strain.”
“Super Great Weed. 💯 KO stuff!! What a great find👍👍”

“When I opened the jar it smelled of fermented lemonade & earthy. The nugs were dense, dark green & very crystal coated. The smoke is smooth, but expands a bit hitting you pretty fast. The buzz starts in the head & moves to relax you completely, eventually caused me to get tired & I slept well. Great for napping.”
“Good old brand x what a sleeping mans dream. Caution! Only one hit & wait a bit! Stoned out! Real heavy effects”
“Spank you very much Brand X you make me sleep like a baby! Tastes great but less filling🍆💦”

“Really did me good. The test results at the dispensary's in Detriot was 23.02% total cannabinoids. Great for my pain, but even better for sleep. I usually wake up several times through out the night, but not last night! Also, the budtender said this was a Michigan strain, which we don't see a lot of around here, so glad I tried it & have some on had. Warning: Very strong medicine”
“Number 1 on my list. Strong as hell ! Will give you a serious head rush. I suggest you sit down ! Only other weed THIS GOOD  Gandalf ! If you see Brand X
column4: grab it. I'm going back for more tomorrow morning 😆”"

column3: “A wonderful heavy hitter. I slept well & happy all through out the night until my alarm went off & that's very rare for me. Great for insomnia. Thumbs up!!!!”
“Boom! That is you hitting the bed after puffing on this one... good high quality and potent strain.”
“My favorite every time I visit Michigan”
“great strain nicely grown. flavorful strain grower / breeder def knew what they were doin”
“This deserves credit, where it definitely worked on my sleep deprivation. Pretty, hard, pine smelled right through the bag & my car too. Lol. Couldn't hid her. Worked great. I'm in”

“Definitely a mostly Indica strain with the relaxation, body feel, that will eventually have you sleeping well & hard. Hard rock, dark green, pine & earthy hashish smell & taste! If you have sleeping issues, I would give Brand X a try! You won't be disappointed! 🤙”
“Impressive Indica! All rounder if your a Indica lover than this one is for you. Give it a try if you see it at your local shop. I never heard of it, until now! It's definitely 💰”
“Working wonders on my sleeping problems!!  Nice Narcotic relief for pain!! Wow”
“Very good medicine. Strong smell & buzz! Put you KO”

“Nice high quality, top shelf in all aspects of critiquing fine cannabis. The grower took great care in every step to make sure it was done right & proper! I especially liked that it was organically grown too.🏄”
“A perfect Indica for winding down at the end of a long hard day. You will feel relaxed, a little hungry, possibly couch-lock & most definitely tired at the end. Good Night 😴”
“One heck of a buzz!! This was all good in every aspect!!”
“Just tried this one & am impressed. Worked great for my insomnia & overall well being. Nice Indica. Great Find”
“Put me down! Excellent herb for pain, attitude adjustments & sleep 😴”
“Super intense! Great narcotic effects”
“Very heavy Indica. Quite impressive. This girl has it all. Look, feel, smell, taste & of course most importantly the effects! 5 stars A ☝️”
“Very heavy Indica, but starts with a headiness before moving to the whole body. Probably best for Night use”

“Once I tried Frosted Freak I wanted to see what one of the parents was like to see if it could even be better, but it was more Indica than I prefer, but still good. I could tell they were related but not what I thought. FF must be the more sativa dominated pheno or a backcross.
Anyways, still good”
“Pretty heavy stuff. If your a Indica lover, then you should take her out on a date & see if your attractive. Be careful you may fall in love 😍 She is definitely a dime”

“Quite interesting & intense. For a mostly Indica I did get a lot of head change. Then gradually tapered off into a great body relaxing experience. Got the munchies, laid around & slept like a kitten

👏

Well done Strain especially for appetite & sleep”
“Very heavy Indica. Great for sleep & pain relief. 💪👍”
“Fourth of July weekend & Brand X= A very special experience!! Love this stuff!!😘”
“Super couch fare here! 🤣 Very intense. Hard stinky, sticky buds. Have me the munchies & I crashed hard!! 😍”

“So happy I found this rare Michigan strain just in time for the holiday weekend! Super Happy 4th of July weekend!
Awesome bud great effects!

😎🔥”
“Quick onset, almost immediately. Very dank bud. Very beautiful. Beware!! If you do to much couch lock. Really good for sleeping too.”
“Fast acting, dense buds that are covered in glossy resin that makes you r jaw drop a your pecker hard..Energetic laughter with giggles, good as it is now as it was in 1990.”
